title: Ticket #3432: AI_ADDRCONFIG considered harmful
description:
The AI_ADDRCONFIG entry in struct addrinfo.ai_flags, passed to getaddrinfo, doesn't necessarily operate as desired or as documented. The benefit is marginal (since Condor doesn't do much resolution of hostnames in practice). Details: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Networking/NameResolution/ADDRCONFIG

Proposed: Expunge AI_ADDRCONFIG from Condor. Might slightly slow some DNS queries, but eliminates all dodgy edge cases.
